description: The Infernal <hyperlink>World</hyperlink> of <hyperlink>Obbadoth</hyperlink>, realm of war and <hyperlink>Chaos</hyperlink>, is cause for many a wary tale. The beings who rule Obbadoth promise great powers... to those who can pay the price.
name: Fiendish Takeover
sub_header: has been replaced...

description: The Gilded Wastes once were a flourishing gold mining complex. The days of ancient Myrrida are long gone, but it appears that many of its riches survived the ages unspoiled.
name: Gilded Wastes
sub_header: Seek the old Myrridan treasures!

description: The Molten Scar is an arrangement of chasms whose shape bears semblance to the markings of a gargantuan claw. It is believed to have been inflicted on the land during the Great Hunt, when the Elder Giants battled the large Primordial Beasts.
name: Molten Scar
sub_header: Free the beasts captured by the <hyperlink>Fire Clan</hyperlink>!

description: The <hyperlink>Rock Clan</hyperlink> has built up these halls anew, aspiring to emulate the grandeur of their <hyperlink>Elder Giant</hyperlink> forefathers. They believe in a Creator watching over their chambers, where one can commune with the mysteries of the material world.
name: Hall of Enigmas
sub_header: Unravel the mysteries of the <hyperlink>Rock Clan</hyperlink>.

description: The Giant Clans believe that you, the owner of their Menhir Artifacts from Titan's Henge, are the spiritual Heir of Thagnokar, destined to unite Giant kin and lead them to new glory. To them, this glory may only be achieved through combat and the downfall of the empires of the smaller races.
name: Thagnokar's Heir
sub_header: The Giant Clans are preparing their assault.

description: This region was once a bastion of the <hyperlink>Blood Clan</hyperlink>. Now it is taken over by the <hyperlink>Sons of the Kjörnoe</hyperlink>, and the <TSR_TROLL_KING></TSR_TROLL_KING> seeks help to regain control of <<o:<TSR_TROLL_KING></TSR_TROLL_KING>>> throne.
name: Mount Godkeep
sub_header: The <hyperlink>Sons of the Kjörnoe</hyperlink> are practicing dark rituals in this region...

description: The <hyperlink>Company of Lost Treasures</hyperlink> are busy excavating and looting the ruins of a Myrridan city. They make use of <hyperlink>Devastator sphere unit</hyperlink> to break through even the hardest bedrock, yet there are many dangers that may be unearthed this way...
name: Deepglitter Chambers
sub_header: The <hyperlink>Company of Lost Treasures</hyperlink> are excavating the ruins of a Myrridan city...

description: A <TSR_HORNED_GOD></TSR_HORNED_GOD> watches over the overgrown ruins of this region. <<Cp:<TSR_HORNED_GOD></TSR_HORNED_GOD>>> holds grudges against all Dragon kin and seeks to eradicate the Draconic creatures disturbing the peace of <<o:<TSR_HORNED_GOD></TSR_HORNED_GOD>>> garden.
name: Colonnade Garden
sub_header: There are Draconic denizens roaming this region...

description: The three islands of this region are watched over by a powerful <TSR_CRYSTAL_LORD></TSR_CRYSTAL_LORD>. Answer well in <<o:<TSR_CRYSTAL_LORD></TSR_CRYSTAL_LORD>>> trials to inherit <<o:<TSR_CRYSTAL_LORD></TSR_CRYSTAL_LORD>>> ancient knowledge—or fail and face <<o:<TSR_CRYSTAL_LORD></TSR_CRYSTAL_LORD>>> wrathful judgment.
name: Trinity Island
sub_header: Visit the eternal prisoners of the <TSR_CRYSTAL_LORD></TSR_CRYSTAL_LORD> to answer <<o:<TSR_CRYSTAL_LORD></TSR_CRYSTAL_LORD>>> three trials!

description: Emnora is divided into four rings, representing different levels of Ascension. To talk to the Archon High Council, you must reach the Fourth Ring.
name: The Rings of Emnora
sub_header: Ascend and reach the Archon High Council.

description: Your fears are manifesting into physical shapes, attacking your cities.
name: Incarnations of Woe
sub_header: Prepare to face the manifestations of your fears...

description: <hyperlink>Magic</hyperlink> and <hyperlink>Physical Ranged</hyperlink> attacks of <hyperlink>Ranged unit</hyperlink>, <hyperlink>Battle mage</hyperlink>, and <hyperlink>Skirmisher</hyperlink>:<bulletlist><bullet>Deal +30% more damage.</bullet><bullet>Have -1<hyperlink><range></range>Range</hyperlink>.</bullet></bulletlist>
name: Sign of the Huntress
sub_header: The <hyperlink>Sign of the huntress property group</hyperlink> affects <hyperlink>Ranged unit</hyperlink>, <hyperlink>Battle mage</hyperlink>, and <hyperlink>Skirmisher</hyperlink>.

description: <bulletlist><bullet>Forests start to spread into adjacent provinces.</bullet><bullet><hyperlink>Starseeds combat property</hyperlink> active in combat.</bullet><bullet>Units on Forest provinces suffer from <hyperlink>Starseeds property group</hyperlink>.</bullet></bulletlist>
name: Invading Sylviculture
sub_header:
A World Seedling causes forests to spread.
<hyperlink>Starseeds combat property</hyperlink> is active in combat.
<hyperlink>Starseeds property group</hyperlink> affects units on forest provinces.

description: <bulletlist><bullet>Armies of hostile astral creatures appear across the world.</bullet><bullet><hyperlink>Ethereal</hyperlink> units gain <hyperlink>a random positive status effect</hyperlink> when a spell is cast.</bullet></bulletlist>
name: Ravenous Visitants
sub_header:
Astral parasites invade your world!
<hyperlink>Ethereal</hyperlink> Units benefit from <hyperlink>Infinite being group</hyperlink>.

description: <bulletlist><bullet>Cities gain +100% <knowledge></knowledge> <hyperlink>Knowledge</hyperlink> income.</bullet><bullet>Declaring wars is always <hyperlink>unjust</hyperlink>.</bullet><bullet>Ending wars grants 200 <influence></influence> <hyperlink>Imperium</hyperlink>.</bullet></bulletlist>
name: Starry-eyed Enlightenment
sub_header:
<knowledge></knowledge> <hyperlink>Knowledge</hyperlink> income increased by +100%.
Declaring wars is always <hyperlink>unjust</hyperlink>.
Ending wars grants 200 <influence></influence> <hyperlink>Imperium</hyperlink>.

boosted_button_description: For the rest of the game:<bulletlist><bullet>All units have -<amount4></amount4> <statuseffectresistance></statuseffectresistance> <hyperlink>Status Resistance</hyperlink>.</bullet></bulletlist>
boosted_description:
Fiend units have:[bulletlist]Base attacks have a 30% chance of inflicting a random status effect. Free City lose -10 Allegiance per turn and are able to declare war on their overlords when reaching Pactofvassalagelvl-1concept or lower.[/bulletlist]

For the rest of the game:All units have -2 Fire Resistance.All units have - Status Resistance.
boosted_sub_header:
Demons are empowered by <hyperlink>Eye of fire property group</hyperlink>.
Units are affected by <hyperlink>Chaotic influence empowered group</hyperlink>.
<hyperlink>Vassals</hyperlink> are growing distrustful of their Overlords.
description:
Fiend units have:[bulletlist]Base attacks have a 30% chance of inflicting a random status effect. Free City lose -10 Allegiance per turn and are able to declare war on their overlords when reaching Pactofvassalagelvl-1concept or lower.[/bulletlist]

For the rest of the game:All units have -2 Fire Resistance.
name: Eye Of Fire
not_boosted_description:
For 10 turns:Fiend units have:[bulletlist]Base attacks have a 30% chance of inflicting a random Negative Status Effect.Vassals lose 10 Allegiance per turn, Vassal can declare war on their overlord if their allegiance drops below Vassalage.[/bulletlist]
-4 Fire Resistance.[/bulletlist]
not_boosted_sub_header:
Demons are empowered by <hyperlink>Eye of fire property group</hyperlink>.
Units are affected by <hyperlink>Chaotic influence group</hyperlink>.
Vassals are growing distrustful of their Overlords.
sub_header:
Demons are empowered by <hyperlink>Eye of fire property group</hyperlink>.
Units are affected by <hyperlink>Chaotic influence group</hyperlink>.
<hyperlink>Vassals</hyperlink> are growing distrustful of their Overlords.

description: <hyperlink>Shield unit</hyperlink> have:<bulletlist><bullet>Attacks deal +40% damage.</bullet><bullet>-4 <defense></defense> <hyperlink>Defense</hyperlink>.</bullet></bulletlist>
name: Sign of the Cleft Shield
sub_header: The <hyperlink>Sign of the cleft shield property group</hyperlink> affects <hyperlink>Shield unit</hyperlink>.

description: <bulletlist><bullet>Base <hyperlink>Unit Upkeep</hyperlink> is reduced by up to -50%.</bullet><bullet>Cities gain +100% <unitprod></unitprod> <hyperlink>Draft</hyperlink> income.</bullet><bullet>At the end of the happening, gain 20 <gold></gold> <hyperlink>Gold</hyperlink> for each unit in your empire.</bullet></bulletlist>
name: Portent of Rousing
sub_header:
Units benefit from the <hyperlink>Xorn javelin group</hyperlink>.
Cities gain +100% <unitprod></unitprod> <hyperlink>Draft</hyperlink> income.
At the end of the happening, gain 20 <gold></gold> <hyperlink>Gold</hyperlink> for each unit in your empire.

description: <bulletlist><bullet><hyperlink>Blightfall combat property</hyperlink> active in combat.</bullet><bullet>Cities lose -5 <food></food> <hyperlink>Food</hyperlink> per <population></population> <hyperlink>Population</hyperlink>.</bullet></bulletlist>
name: Blightfall Conjunction
sub_header:
<hyperlink>Blightfall combat property</hyperlink> is active in combat.
Cities require more <food></food> <hyperlink>Food</hyperlink>.

description: <bulletlist><bullet>Provinces turn into Deserts around the world.</bullet><bullet><hyperlink>Solar winds combat property</hyperlink> active in combat.</bullet></bulletlist>
name: Cosmic Winds
sub_header:
Deserts spread across your world.
<hyperlink>Solar winds combat property</hyperlink> affects combat.

description: <bulletlist><bullet>Teleporter province improvements, Teleportation spells, and Teleportation abilities are disabled.</bullet></bulletlist>
name: Phase-shift Nixing
sub_header:
<hyperlink>Phasing units</hyperlink> suffer from <hyperlink>Phase shift nixing group</hyperlink>.
<GLOBAL.STRUCTURE_UPGRADES.TELEPORTER></GLOBAL.STRUCTURE_UPGRADES.TELEPORTER> and teleporting spells and abilities are disabled.

description: <bulletlist><bullet>Arctic terrain spreads around the world.</bullet><bullet><hyperlink>Solar winter combat property</hyperlink> active in combat.</bullet><bullet>Units on Arctic provinces suffer from <hyperlink>Solar winter property group</hyperlink>.</bullet></bulletlist>
name: Rays of Winter
sub_header:
Arctic terrain slowly covers the land.
<hyperlink>Solar winter combat property</hyperlink> is active in combat.
Units on Arctic provinces suffer from <hyperlink>Solar winter property group</hyperlink>.

description: <bulletlist><bullet><mana></mana> <hyperlink>Mana</hyperlink> income in reduced by -30%.</bullet><bullet><hyperlink>Combat Spell</hyperlink> and <hyperlink>World Map Spell</hyperlink> cost +50% Casting Points.</bullet></bulletlist>
name: Astral Eclipse
sub_header:
<mana></mana> <hyperlink>Mana</hyperlink> income reduced by -30%.
Combat and World Map Spells cost +50% Casting Points.

description: <bulletlist><bullet>All units have a 30% chance of turning slain non-<hyperlink>Undead</hyperlink> enemies into Zombies under your control that stay after combat.</bullet><bullet>These Zombies have <GLOBAL.PROPERTIES.CANNOT_REGENERATE></GLOBAL.PROPERTIES.CANNOT_REGENERATE>.</bullet></bulletlist>
name: Melenis's Kiss
sub_header:
All units have a 30% chance of turning slain enemies into Zombies under your control.
These Zombies stay after combat and have <hyperlink>Cannot regenerate</hyperlink>.

description: <bulletlist><bullet>Provinces turn into Desolate around the world.</bullet><bullet><hyperlink>Sunstruck eruptions combat property</hyperlink> active in combat.</bullet></bulletlist>
name: Sunstruck Eruptions
sub_header:
<hyperlink>Sunstruck eruptions combat property</hyperlink> is active in combat.
Provinces are slowly becoming Desolate.

description: <bulletlist><bullet>Cities gain +2% <structureprod></structureprod> <hyperlink>Production</hyperlink> income.</bullet><bullet>All units have <hyperlink>Siege breaker</hyperlink>.</bullet></bulletlist>
name: Stirring Stone Conjunction
sub_header:
Cities gain +100% <structureprod></structureprod> <hyperlink>Production</hyperlink> income.
All units have <hyperlink>Siege breaker</hyperlink>.

boosted_button_description: For the rest of the game:<bulletlist><bullet>All units that are not <hyperlink>Celestial</hyperlink>, or do not have <hyperlink>Faithful</hyperlink> or <hyperlink>Zeal</hyperlink> are permanently <hyperlink>Condemned</hyperlink>.</bullet></bulletlist>
boosted_description:
Celestial units and units with Faithful or Zeal have:[bulletlist]+2 Status Resistance+20 Morale Free City spawn armies to attack their targets.[/bulletlist]

For the rest of the game:All units have -2 Spirit Resistance.All units that are not Celestial, or do not have Faithful or Zeal are permanently Condemned.
boosted_sub_header:
<hyperlink>Ch order property group</hyperlink> affects <hyperlink>Celestial</hyperlink> units and units with <hyperlink>Faithful</hyperlink> or <hyperlink>Zeal</hyperlink>
<minorcity></minorcity> <hyperlink>Free City</hyperlink> spawn armies to attack their targets
All units permanently suffer <hyperlink>Order influence group</hyperlink>
Non-<hyperlink>Celestial</hyperlink> units without <hyperlink>Faithful</hyperlink> or <hyperlink>Zeal</hyperlink> are permanently <hyperlink>Condemned</hyperlink>
description:
Celestial units and units with Faithful or Zeal have:[bulletlist]+2 Status Resistance+20 Morale Free City spawn armies to attack their targets.[/bulletlist]

For the rest of the game:All units have -2 Spirit Resistance.
name: Dawn of the Lodestar
not_boosted_description:
For 10 turns:
o Celestial units and units with Faithful or Zeal have:
o +2 Status Resistance
o +20 Morale

For the rest of the game:
o All units have -4 Spirit Resistance.
sub_header:
<hyperlink>Ch order property group</hyperlink> affects <hyperlink>Celestial</hyperlink> units and units with <hyperlink>Faithful</hyperlink> or <hyperlink>Zeal</hyperlink>
<minorcity></minorcity> <hyperlink>Free City</hyperlink> spawn armies to attack their targets
All units permanently suffer <hyperlink>Order influence group</hyperlink>

boosted_button_description: For the rest of the game:<bulletlist><bullet>Base <hyperlink>Magic</hyperlink> attacks of <hyperlink>Battle mage</hyperlink> and <hyperlink>Support unit</hyperlink> deal <amount4></amount4>% damage to another target within <amount5></amount5> hexes.</bullet></bulletlist>
boosted_description:
Magic origin units have:[bulletlist]Attacks inflict Sundered resistance.Grant +5 Combat Casting Point in combat.All Combat Spell start Overcharged.[/bulletlist]

For the rest of the game:All units have -2 Lightning Resistance.Base Magic attacks of Battle mage and Support unit deal % damage to another target within hexes.
boosted_sub_header:
<hyperlink>Ch astral property group</hyperlink> affects <hyperlink>Magic origin</hyperlink> units. 
<hyperlink>Combat Spell</hyperlink> are <hyperlink>Overcharged</hyperlink> the first time they are cast each combat.
Units permanently suffer <hyperlink>Astral influence group</hyperlink>.
<hyperlink>Astral influence empowered group</hyperlink> affects the base <hyperlink>Magic</hyperlink> attacks of <hyperlink>Battle mage</hyperlink> and <hyperlink>Support unit</hyperlink>.
description:
Magic origin units have:[bulletlist]Attacks inflict Sundered resistance.Grant +5 Combat Casting Point in combat.Combat Spell are always Overcharged the first time they are cast each combat.[/bulletlist]

For the rest of the game:All units have -2 Lightning Resistance.
name: Drifting Ley Lines
not_boosted_description:
For 10 turns:
o Ethereal units have:
o Attacks inflict Sundered Resistance.
o Grants +5 Casting Points in combat.
o Spell are "Overcharged" in TC.

For the rest of the game:
o All units have -4 Lightning Resistance.
sub_header:
<hyperlink>Ch astral property group</hyperlink> affects <hyperlink>Magic origin</hyperlink> units. 
<hyperlink>Combat Spell</hyperlink> are <hyperlink>Overcharged</hyperlink> the first time they are cast each combat.
Units permanently suffer <hyperlink>Astral influence group</hyperlink>.

description: <bulletlist><bullet><hyperlink>Colossus moon unit auto spell</hyperlink> active in combat.</bullet><bullet>Regions around the world turn into Swamps.</bullet></bulletlist>
name: Colossus Moon
sub_header: <hyperlink>Thunder Storms</hyperlink> are active in combat. Regions around the world turn into Swamps.

description: <hyperlink>Shock unit</hyperlink> have:<bulletlist><bullet><hyperlink>Very fast movement</hyperlink> in combat.</bullet><bullet><hyperlink>Magic</hyperlink> and <hyperlink>Physical Ranged</hyperlink> attacks against this unit have -20% <hyperlink><accuracy></accuracy> Accuracy</hyperlink>.</bullet><bullet><hyperlink>Melee</hyperlink> attacks deal -20% damage.</bullet></bulletlist>
name: Sign of the Vanguard
sub_header: The <hyperlink>Sign of the vanguard property group</hyperlink> affects <hyperlink>Shock unit</hyperlink>.

description: <hyperlink>Support unit</hyperlink> and <hyperlink>Battle mage</hyperlink> have:<bulletlist><bullet><hyperlink>Magic</hyperlink> and <hyperlink>Support</hyperlink> abilities have +1<hyperlink><range></range>Range</hyperlink>.</bullet><bullet><hyperlink>Slow movement</hyperlink> in combat.</bullet></bulletlist>
name: Sign of the Lumbering Staff
sub_header: The <hyperlink>Sign of the lumbering staff property group</hyperlink> affects <hyperlink>Battle mage</hyperlink> and <hyperlink>Support unit</hyperlink>.

description: Lithyl Nightweaver is preparing an eldritch ritual to corrupt all of Athla. To delay her, you need to destroy her thralls on the map which are affected by the Gloom Strider and Umbral Flesh transformations.
name: Nightweaver Ritual
objective_info_2: When the ritual is completed, you lose the game.
sub_header: Delay Lithyl by killing any unit with <hyperlink>Gloomstrider transformation</hyperlink> or <hyperlink>Umbral flesh</hyperlink> before they can be sacrificed.

description: Sundren has made a pact with the <hyperlink>Endailon</hyperlink> of <hyperlink>Shadow</hyperlink>. Channeling its power, she seeks to purge Athla's Umbral Abyss, taking the fight to the enemy.
name: Shadow to Shadow
objective_03: Reap the gifts of the Shadow Endailon.
sub_header: Assault the Umbral Abyss to delay the Nightweaver Ritual!

tree_taken: <WORLD.ER2_WORLD_TREE_PLAYER></WORLD.ER2_WORLD_TREE_PLAYER> has conquered the <WORLD.ER2_WORLD_TREE_STRUCTURE></WORLD.ER2_WORLD_TREE_STRUCTURE> and is entering dark communion with Athla. The Nightweaver Ritual will progress twice as fast until the <WORLD.ER2_WORLD_TREE_STRUCTURE></WORLD.ER2_WORLD_TREE_STRUCTURE> is liberated again!

description: The <hyperlink>Eternal Sages</hyperlink> seek to commune with their kin across the <hyperlink>Astral Sea</hyperlink>. They've enlisted someone with the power of a <hyperlink>Godir</hyperlink> to function as their Medium.
description_active_medium: <bulletlist><bullet>Cities gain +100% <knowledge></knowledge> <hyperlink>Knowledge</hyperlink> income.</bullet><bullet>As the Medium, you gain additional rewards when any player completes <hyperlink>Research</hyperlink>:[bulletlist]</bullet><bullet><order></order> <hyperlink>Order Affinity</hyperlink> research yields <happiness></happiness> <hyperlink>City Stability</hyperlink> in all your Cities.</bullet><bullet><chaos></chaos> <hyperlink>Chaos Affinity</hyperlink> research yields <unitprod></unitprod> <hyperlink>Draft</hyperlink> in all your Cities.</bullet><bullet><arcana></arcana> <hyperlink>Astral Affinity</hyperlink> research yields <mana></mana> <hyperlink>Mana</hyperlink>.</bullet><bullet><matter></matter> <hyperlink>Materium Affinity</hyperlink> research yields <gold></gold> <hyperlink>Gold</hyperlink>.</bullet><bullet><nature></nature> <hyperlink>Nature Affinity</hyperlink> research yields <food></food> <hyperlink>Food</hyperlink> in all your Cities.</bullet><bullet><shadow></shadow> <hyperlink>Shadow Affinity</hyperlink> research yields <knowledge></knowledge> <hyperlink>Knowledge</hyperlink> in all your Cities.</bullet><bullet>Research without any <hyperlink>Affinity</hyperlink> yields you <influence></influence> <hyperlink>Imperium</hyperlink>.</bullet><bullet>Dual <hyperlink>Affinity</hyperlink> research yields the rewards for both Affinities.</bullet></bulletlist>[/bulletlist]
name: The Cosmic Conclave
sub_header: The <hyperlink>Crystal Dwelling</hyperlink> initiates the Cosmic Conclave ritual.
sub_header_active_medium: <bulletlist><bullet>Global <knowledge></knowledge> <hyperlink>Knowledge</hyperlink> income increased by +100%.</bullet><bullet>You gain additional bonuses when any player completes <hyperlink>Research</hyperlink>.</bullet></bulletlist>

description: The cult of the Sons of the Kjörnoe believe that you, the owner of the Soulcursed Artifacts, can reawaken their beloved Traitor Kings. For that to happen, a dark ritual needs to take place, which requires a powerful sacrifice...
name: Return of the Kjörnoe
sub_header: A strange Cult approaches the Keeper of the Soulcursed Artifacts.

description: The Famished Fields are cursed by a ceaseless hunger. Shrouded in malice, the gluttonous  has manifested <<r:TSR_TRAITOR_KING>> with three different aspects to challenge and weaken.
name: Famished Fields
sub_header: This region is cursed with <hyperlink>Tsr ff maldiction of gluttony</hyperlink>.

description: Gaining hold of the three Flowrock Artifacts of old <hyperlink>Myrrida</hyperlink>, you have awakened the Last Legion, an army of Clay Soldiers and Animated Weapons dating back to the time when <hyperlink>Myrrida</hyperlink> was besieged. Following their ancient orders, taking you for a <hyperlink>Giant King</hyperlink>, the Last Legion now seeks to attack any "invaders" of the realm.
name: The Last Legion
sub_header: The Last Legion is preparing its assault on the realm!

description: It is said that those who lean too far into <hyperlink>Chaos</hyperlink> risk stirring the bringer of cataclysms, the harbinger of destruction. The end of realms is heralded by a draconic roar...
name: Dawn of Calamity
sub_header: 2 has been replaced...

description: When a realm is in turmoil and no solution seems to be in sight, the divine machinations of the <hyperlink>Astral Sea</hyperlink> bring forth a Judge to restore <hyperlink>Order</hyperlink>. The day of judgment has come.
name: Day of Judgment
sub_header: has been replaced...

description: As immortal souls, many <hyperlink>Godir</hyperlink> stop fearing death altogether. A grave mistake, for Death itself is not one to taunt. When you play games with the Reaper, make sure you win... and ask not for whom the bell tolls.
name: Game of Death
sub_header: 3 has been replaced...

description: Even the Council of a powerful <hyperlink>Godir</hyperlink> is not safe from politics and intrigue. Many sycophants prey on a Ruler's weakest moment to claim power through any means necessary.
name: Honor and Intrigue
sub_header: The  have a new <IntrigueVictimPlayer.Title></IntrigueVictimPlayer.Title>...

description: When times are dire and tyrants rule, from the people a <hyperlink>Champion</hyperlink> will ascend to take the throne and lead them to a greater tomorrow... Unless said tyrant stops them.
name: Voice of the People
sub_header: Unrest brews within the Empire of <IntrigueVictimPlayer></IntrigueVictimPlayer>...

description:
Your struggle with the Astral forces weakens your rule, temporarily decreasing City Stability in all of your City.

The strength of this effect scales up with higher Astral Empire Affinity.
title: <astralcrisis></astralcrisis> Astral Crisis

description:
Your struggle with the forces of Chaos weakens your rule, temporarily decreasing City Stability in all of your City.

The strength of this effect scales up with higher Chaos Empire Affinity.
title: <chaoscrisis></chaoscrisis> Chaos Crisis

description:
Your struggle with the forces of Materium weakens your rule, temporarily decreasing City Stability in all of your City.

The strength of this effect scales up with higher Materium Empire Affinity.
title: <materiumcrisis></materiumcrisis> Materium Crisis

description:
Your struggle with the forces of Nature weakens your rule, temporarily decreasing City Stability in all of your City.

The strength of this effect scales up with higher Nature Empire Affinity.
title: <naturecrisis></naturecrisis> Nature Crisis

description:
Your struggle with the forces of Order weakens your rule, temporarily decreasing City Stability in all of your City.

The strength of this effect scales up with higher Order Empire Affinity.
title: <ordercrisis></ordercrisis> Order Crisis

description:
Your struggle with the forces of Shadow weakens your rule, temporarily decreasing City Stability in all of your City.

The strength of this effect scales up with higher Shadow Empire Affinity.
title: <shadowcrisis></shadowcrisis> Shadow Crisis

description: Little is known about the Endailon Crisis, though it has become a topic of great interest among the scholars of <hyperlink>Magehaven</hyperlink>. What has been established as commonly accepted knowledge, is that the Endailon Crisis happened in a distant age, before the <hyperlink>first Godir</hyperlink> set foot on <hyperlink>Magehaven</hyperlink>. It was a conflict of cosmic scale, involving the <hyperlink>Endailon</hyperlink> and possibly factions under their influence on one side, and the <hyperlink>Archons</hyperlink> and their allies—notably among them the <hyperlink>Ancient Krazura</hyperlink>—on the other. The Endailon Crisis ended with the <hyperlink>Endailon</hyperlink> becoming locked within <hyperlink>Grexolis</hyperlink>.
title: Endailon Crisis
